### flashcards

* I have created a pdf of over 200 flash cards that cover foundations of statistical inference and fundamentals of probability, print double-sided & cut ‚úÅ them out for a fun evening of studying bliss! [[view here](https://docs.google.com/viewer?url=https://github.com/LucyMcGowan/comps-survival-guide/raw/master/FlashCards.pdf), [download here](https://github.com/LucyMcGowan/comps-survival-guide/raw/master/FlashCards.pdf)]
* These are hosted on  [github](https://github.com/LucyMcGowan/comps-survival-guide/blob/master/FlashCards.tex) -- please add to them!
